Name: Cryptococcal meningitis
Definition: A fungal meningitis that has_material_basis in Crypococcus fungal infection.

Name: histoplasmosis meningitis
Definition: A histoplasmosis endocarditis that results_in inflammation located_in endocardium

Name: obsolete hypoaldosteronism
Definition: A histoplasmosis endocarditis that results_in inflammation located_in endocardium

Name: obsolete Cushing's syndrome
Definition: An adrenal gland hyperfunction that is caused by overactivity of the adrenal cortex caused by a tumor of the pituitary gland.
